name: Joy's Rampage
description:
Blast Joy's enemies back into the darkness in this top-down shooter. 

Move with WASD or the arrow keys, shoot with the left mouse button. You can click and hold to auto fire. 

Any feedback would be appreciated please leave a comment below!

This it the first game I've made, using Unity. I've made all the assets myself using assorted free tools. I hope you enjoy it!
